actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Department of Veterans Affairs to require mandatory disclosure of social security numbers in claims for disability and death benefits.

summary.text: Requires any veteran, or spouse or dependent of such veteran, who applies for or is in receipt of veterans' disability compensation or pension benefits to provide to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, upon request, his or her social security number and the social security number of any other person in his or her family applying for or receiving any such benefits.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Department of Veterans Affairs to require mandatory disclosure of social security numbers in claims for disability and death benefits.
